introduction.p: A liability of 100,000 will come due at the end of year 5, and another liability of 175,000 will come due at the end of year 10. To immunize these liabilities at \iota_0 = 8\%, the firm purchases a zero coupon bond of amount A_1 maturing at time t_1 and a second zero-coupon bond of amount A_2 maturing at time t_2.
Given t_1 and t_2 below, find A_1 and A_2. If immunization is not possible, say so and justify.

A single liability of 250,000 will come due at the end of year 8. To immunize these liabilities at \iota_0 = 5\%, the firm purchases a zero coupon bond of amount A_1 maturing at time t_1 and a second zero-coupon bond of amount A_2 maturing at time t_2.
Given t_1 and t_2 below, find A_1 and A_2. If immunization is not possible, say so and justify.
